text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/action-code defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
send-message Send a message The action indicates that a particular message should be sent to a participant in the process.
collect-information Collect information The action indicates that information should be collected from a participant in the process.
prescribe-medication Prescribe a medication The action indicates that a particular medication should be prescribed to the patient.
recommend-immunization Recommend an immunization The action indicates that a particular immunization should be performed.
order-service Order a service The action indicates that a particular service should be provided.
propose-diagnosis Propose a diagnosis The action indicates that a particular diagnosis should be proposed.
record-detected-issue Record a detected issue The action indicates that a particular detected issue should be recorded.
record-inference Record an inference The action indicates that a particular inference should be recorded.
report-flag Report a flag The action indicates that a particular flag should be reported.

name: ActionCode
title: Action Code
description: Provides examples of actions to be performed.

concept.definition: The action indicates that a particular message should be sent to a participant in the process.
The action indicates that information should be collected from a participant in the process.
The action indicates that a particular medication should be prescribed to the patient.
The action indicates that a particular immunization should be performed.
The action indicates that a particular service should be provided.
The action indicates that a particular diagnosis should be proposed.
The action indicates that a particular detected issue should be recorded.
The action indicates that a particular inference should be recorded.
The action indicates that a particular flag should be reported.
